verbose_text: Importantly we further find that the lifespan reduction effect caused by knockdown of the transcripts of Rpn1 gene in adult fly muscle completely abolished the lifespan extension effect caused by the over-expression of a wild type Daw or Myo gene in muscle (blue curves in XREF_FIG D and E versus the blue curves in XREF_FIG A-D; Table S9).
evidence: over-expression of a wild type Daw or Myo gene
